001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import static java.util.Arrays.asList;
005
006import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
010import java.util.function.Function;
011
012import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
013import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
014import dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy;
015import dev.failsafe.event.ExecutionAttemptedEvent;
016
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonException;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
020
021import org.slf4j.Logger;
022import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
023
024/**
025 * Implementation for a retry of a requests upon configured response status codes
026 */
027public class RetryMiddleware implements Middleware, AutoCloseable {
028    static final String loggerName = ClientBuilder.COMMERCETOOLS + ".retry";
029
030    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY = 60000;
031    public static final int DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY = 200;
032    public static final List<Integer> DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES = asList(500, 503);
033    private static final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(loggerName);
034    private static final Logger classLogger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RetryMiddleware.class);
035
036    private final FailsafeExecutor<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> failsafeExecutor;
037
038    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
039        this(maxRetries, DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES);
040    }
041
042    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
043        this(maxRetries, DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, statusCodes);
044    }
045
046    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
047        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES);
048    }
049
050    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
051            final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
052        RetryPolicy<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> retryPolicy = RetryPolicy.<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> builder()
053                .handleIf((response, throwable) -> {
054                    if (throwable instanceof ApiHttpException) {
055                        return statusCodes.contains(((ApiHttpException) throwable).getStatusCode());
056                    }
057                    return statusCodes.contains(response.getStatusCode());
058                })
059                .withBackoff(delay, maxDelay, ChronoUnit.MILLIS)
060                .withJitter(0.25)
061                .onRetry(this::logEventFailure)
062                .withMaxRetries(maxRetries)
063                .build();
064        this.failsafeExecutor = Failsafe.with(retryPolicy);
065    }
066
067    private void logEventFailure(ExecutionAttemptedEvent<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> event) {
068        final int attempt = event.getAttemptCount();
069
070        logger.info(() -> "Retry #" + attempt);
071        logger.trace(() -> {
072            final Throwable failure = event.getLastFailure();
073            if (failure instanceof ApiHttpException) {
074                final ApiHttpException httpException = (ApiHttpException) failure;
075                final ApiHttpRequest request = httpException.getRequest();
076                final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response = httpException.getResponse();
077                if (request != null) {
078                    return requestLog(attempt, request, response);
079                }
080            }
081            return event.toString();
082        });
083    }
084
085    private String requestLog(final int attempt, ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<?> response) {
086        String output;
087        final String httpMethodAndUrl = request.getMethod().name() + " " + request.getUrl().toString();
088        if (request.getBody() != null) {
089            final String unformattedBody = request.getSecuredBody();
090            final boolean isJsonRequest = request.getHeaders()
091                    .getHeaders(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)
092                    .stream()
093                    .findFirst()
094                    .map(ct -> ct.getValue().toLowerCase().contains("json"))
095                    .orElse(true);
096            if (isJsonRequest) {
097                String prettyPrint;
098                try {
099                    prettyPrint = JsonUtils.prettyPrint(unformattedBody);
100                }
101                catch (final JsonException e) {
102                    classLogger.warn("pretty print failed", e);
103                    prettyPrint = unformattedBody;
104                }
105                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + "\nformatted: " + prettyPrint;
106            }
107            else {
108                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + request.getMethod().name() + " "
109                        + request.getUrl() + " " + unformattedBody;
110            }
111        }
112        else {
113            output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + " <no body>";
114        }
115        if (response != null) {
116            output += "\nFailure response: " + response.getStatusCode() + "\n" + response + "\n"
117                    + Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody())
118                            .map(body -> JsonUtils.prettyPrint(response.getBodyAsString().orElse("")))
119                            .orElse("<no body>");
120        }
121        return output;
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
126     */
127    @Deprecated
128    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries) {
129        this(maxRetries, DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES);
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
134     */
135    @Deprecated
136    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
137        this(maxRetries, DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, statusCodes);
138    }
139
140    /**
141     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
142     */
143    @Deprecated
144    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
145        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES);
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
150     */
151    @Deprecated
152    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
153            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
154        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, statusCodes);
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(final ApiHttpRequest request,
159            final Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
160        return failsafeExecutor.getStageAsync(() -> next.apply(request));
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public void close() {
165    }
166}
